Hi there! My name is Roberto. I am a PhD student at **Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München** and the **Helmholtz Munich** under the supervision of [Christian L. Müller](https://bio-datascience.github.io/).   
  
Much of my research consists of using **statistics and machine learning** to gain new insights into **biological phenomena**. I particularly look into  subjects related to **antimicrobial resistance**, **analysis of chemical perturbations**, **self-supervised deep learning**, etc. 

Take a look at some of my [projects](projects.qmd) and [publications](publications.qmd#Posters).
